parameters.name: freq
parameters.description: The frequency value of the oscillator in Hz.

parameters.name: amp
parameters.description: The amplitude of the oscillator as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

parameters.name: add
parameters.description: Offset the output of the oscillator by given value

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The panoramic position of the oscillator as a float from -1.0 to 1.0.
